description: 条件句表示'如果...就...'的假设关系，由if引导的条件从句和主句组成

explanation.basic_structure: If + 条件从句, 主句
types: 第一条件句（真实条件）：表示将来可能发生的情况
第二条件句（虚拟条件）：表示现在不太可能或假想的情况
第三条件句（虚拟条件）：表示过去没有发生的假想

first_conditional.structure: If + 一般现在时, 主语 + will + 动词原形 + ...
first_conditional.example: If it rains tomorrow, I will stay at home.
first_conditional.usage: 表示将来可能发生的情况

second_conditional.structure: If + 一般过去时, 主语 + would/could/might + 动词原形 + ...
second_conditional.example: If I were you, I would study harder.
second_conditional.usage: 表示现在不太可能或假想的情况

third_conditional.structure: If + 过去完成时, 主语 + would/could/might have + 过去分词 + ...
third_conditional.example: If I had studied harder, I would have passed the exam.
third_conditional.usage: 表示过去没有发生的假想

common_errors: If I will have time, I will help you. (错误) → If I have time, I will help you. (正确)
If I was you, I would study harder. (错误) → If I were you, I would study harder. (正确)
If I would have studied, I would have passed. (错误) → If I had studied, I would have passed. (正确)
usage_tips: 第一条件句中，if从句用一般现在时表示将来
第二条件句中，be动词统一用were（不论主语）
条件从句可以放在句首或句末，放在句首时用逗号隔开

first_conditional: If it rains tomorrow, we will cancel the picnic.
If I have time, I will help you.
If she studies hard, she will pass the exam.
If you don't hurry, you will miss the train.
If it doesn't rain, we will go to the park.
second_conditional: If I were rich, I would buy a big house.
If she knew the truth, she would be angry.
If I had more time, I would travel around the world.
If you were here, I would be happy.
If it were sunny, we would go swimming.
third_conditional: If I had studied harder, I would have passed the exam.
If they had arrived earlier, they would have got good seats.
If she had known, she would have told me.
If I had had more money, I would have bought a car.
If it had rained, we would have stayed at home.
mixed_conditionals: If I had studied harder, I would be a doctor now.
If I were taller, I would have become a basketball player.
If she had taken the job, she would be living in New York now.
If I had more experience, I would have got the promotion.
with_unless: Unless you hurry, you will miss the train.
Unless it rains, we will have a picnic.
Unless you study hard, you won't pass the exam.
Unless you apologize, I won't forgive you.
with_as_long_as: As long as you try your best, you will succeed.
As long as it doesn't rain, we can go hiking.
As long as you are honest, I will trust you.
As long as you work hard, you will get promoted.

templates.explanation: 第一条件句中，if从句用一般现在时表示将来

templates.question: If I _____ you, I would study harder.
templates.explanation: 第二条件句中，be动词统一用were

templates.question: If I had studied harder, I _____ passed the exam.
templates.explanation: 第三条件句：would have + 过去分词

templates.question: If you _____ (study) hard, you will pass the exam.
templates.explanation: 第一条件句：if从句用一般现在时

templates.question: If I _____ (be) rich, I would travel around the world.
If I had known, I _____ (tell) you.
templates.explanation: 第三条件句：would have + 过去分词

templates.explanation: 第一条件句中，if从句用一般现在时表示将来

templates.requirement: 用第一条件句造句，表示如果下雨就待在家
templates.example: If it rains, I will stay at home.
templates.explanation: 第一条件句表示将来可能发生的情况

templates.requirement: 用第二条件句造句，表示如果我是你
templates.example: If I were you, I would study harder.
templates.explanation: 第二条件句表示现在不太可能的情况

templates.requirement: 用第三条件句造句，表示如果当时努力学习
templates.example: If I had studied harder, I would have passed the exam.
templates.explanation: 第三条件句表示过去没有发生的情况

learning_objectives: 掌握三种条件句的基本构成和用法
能够正确使用不同时态的条件句
学会条件句的否定和疑问形式
能够在实际语境中正确使用条件句

assessment_criteria.excellent: 能够熟练使用各种条件句，无语法错误
assessment_criteria.good: 基本掌握条件句用法，偶有错误
assessment_criteria.satisfactory: 了解条件句基本用法，需要加强练习
assessment_criteria.needs_improvement: 对条件句用法不熟悉，需要重新学习
